revised_title: Errata in Proceedings of the Royal Society of London. Series B: Biological Sciences (1991)
tldr: This article provides corrections for errors found in a previous publication in the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London. Series B: Biological Sciences (1991). The corrections address various typographical and mathematical errors, as well as some errors in the equations and tables. The errors do not affect the numerical results or the conclusions drawn from them.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Marine Biology
